pages.text: 40|50|Te'omloke ka'ba’, ‘tomalokara ocarata spasta pramanadisaha tomalokara raachulasakala aha nachilane’? Jahannamibilake ka’ba, ‘haya arasye ahichila’. Praharaisakale ka’ba, ‘eteke tomaloke'i praarthana karaa; arau kaphirasakalara praarthana kerala nisphalahe haya’.
40|51|Niscaya ami amara raachulasakalaka arau yisakale imana aniche te'omlokaka parthira jiranata sahaya karaima, arau se'idina'o sahaya karaima yidina saksisakala thiya ha’ba.
40|52|Yidina yalimasakalara ojara-apatti sihamtara kono kamata nahiba. Sihamtara babe ache la’nata arau sihamtara babe ache nikrsta abasa.
40|53|Arau arasye ami muchaka hidayata dana karaichilo arau bani icharaa'ilaka kitabara uttaraadhikarai karaichilo
40|54|bodhasakti sampanna lokasakalara babe pathanirdesa arau upadesasbaraupa.

40|55|Eteke tumi dhairya dharana karaa, niscaya allahara pratisrauti satya. Lagate tumi tomara trautira babe ksama praarthana karaa arau puraa-gadhuli tomara pratipalakara saprasansa paraitrata-mahima ghosana karaa.

40|56|Niscaya yisakale nijara ocarata kono dalila-pramana nathaka satbe'o allahara nidarsanarali samparke bitarkata lipta haya, sihamtara antarata ache kerala ahankara, sihamte e'i bisayata ketiya'o saphalata labha karaiba noraaraiba. Eteke tumi kerala allahara ocarata asraya bicaraa; niscaya te'om sarbasraota, sarbadrasta.
40|57|Arasye akasasamuha arau prthiraira srsti, manara srstitakaiyo danara bisaya, kintu adhikansa manuhe seya najane.

40|58|Andha arau drstisampanna byakti ketiya'o samana nahaya, e'idarae yisakale imana aniche arau satkarma karaiche te'omloke arau yisakale asatkarma karaiche sihamte'o samana nahaya. Tomaloke ati saman'yahe upadesa grahana karaa.
